articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A rise in fuel and clothing prices drove inflation up 2.6% in the year to November.
articles.title: UK inflation rate rises for second month in a row

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Wallace stepped away from presenting MasterChef after a BBC News investigation heard allegations against him.
articles.title: Grace Dent to replace Gregg Wallace on Celebrity MasterChef

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Shaun Bowles tells the BBC his daughter was having "so much fun" before drinking tainted alcohol.
articles.title: Holly Bowles: Father of teen who died in Laos poisonings tells BBC she was full of life

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Mechanical engineer Hazar Denli lost his job after publishing online concerns about an electric car.
articles.title: JLR whistleblower sacked for publishing concerns about VinFast cars

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Islamist group that now runs Syria has led everyday life for people in Idlib for seven years.
articles.title: Rebel rule in Idlib hints at what the rest of Syria can expect

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Labour's rejection of a payout for pension age changes is criticised, while Reform UK is in talks with the billionaire.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: 'We have been betrayed' and 'Musk ready to bankroll Farage'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Jamie Gray is desperate to get back the watch, which he says his father wore every day for 20 years.
articles.title: Son appeals for lost Rolex watch after Dad dies at West Ham match

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Nigel Farage tells the BBC he is in "open negotiations" with Elon Musk but no figure has been agreed on.
articles.title: Chris Mason: Elon Musk donation talks with Reform UK raise questions over rules

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A 29-year-old Uzbekistan citizen has been detained over the death of Kirillov and his assistant, state media says.
articles.title: Igor Kirillov: Russia detains Uzbek man over general's killing

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Tens of thousands of pensioners might not get their Winter Fuel Payments this year because of a backlog in processing claims.
articles.title: Pensioners could miss out on Winter Fuel Payment this year
